name: Portfolio
tagline: Portfolio, accessibility, 508 compliance, UX, UI, BlogSpot, Blogger, design portfolio, template
body:
### Welcome to Portfolio Template for Blogspot
This is a set of themes and templates created for Blogger [Blogspot](http://blogger.com).

### Designer Templates
The template folder includes a set of blogger style templates. The templateview folder is the HTML version, most versions do not have an HTML version saved.

To implement the template:

* Go to your blogger site
* Click on the template tab in the admin panel
* Select Edit HTML
* Copy the code and paste the desired code from the template 

### Creating pages manually
Visit the Blogger admin panel. Pages will need links within the template, but posts will automatically be added. For theme bg-3 it is recommended that only 1 post per date is added. Otherwise the date wrapper will offset on screens over 1181px.

### Authors and Contributors
Created by Desarae Veit (@Desaraev) in 2016 on Blogger, GitHub, and Codepen using Bootstrap. username to generate a link to their profile. The resulting `<a>` element will link to the contributor’s GitHub Profile. 

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out the [pattern library](http://www.desaraev.com/p/pattern-library.html), [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](http://goo.gl/forms/adS4pKSJhG0uu6fm1) and we’ll help you sort it out.

### Resources
* [GitHub Flavored Markdown](https://guides.github.com/features/mastering-markdown/)
* [Pattern library](http://www.desaraev.com/p/pattern-library.html)
* [Feedback](http://goo.gl/forms/adS4pKSJhG0uu6fm1)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
